questions.question: What payment methods are available?
questions.answer: Currently, purchase is only available through an application on the website.

questions.question: How long does delivery take?
questions.answer: Order delivery is carried out within 2-4 working days after confirmation.

questions.question: Is it possible to return an item?
questions.answer: Yes, you can request a return by leaving a request in the 'Warranty and Returns' tab or through your order profile.

questions.question: Guarantee
questions.answer: Our products are guaranteed for a period of one year, depending on the product category.

hero.title: trust quality
hero.description: TrustQuality specializes in supplying high quality car wipers and lamps for a wide range of vehicles.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description1: TrustQuality is a company that cares about the safety and comfort of car owners.
mission.description2: We work only with trusted manufacturers to provide customers with access to the most reliable and modern car accessories.
mission.description3: Our team of experts is always ready to provide professional advice on choosing the most suitable wipers, car lamps and accessories, taking into account the make and model of your car.

stats.clients_satisfaction: Clients satisfied with cooperation with us

values.title: Our Key Advantages
values.subtitle: We are proud to help motorists ensure safety and comfort on the roads.
values.assortment_description: We offer a wide selection of windshield wipers and headlights in various types, sizes and models to suit the needs of all car owners.
values.quality_description: TrustQuality works only with leading manufacturers known for their reliability and quality of products.
values.consultation_description: Our experts are always ready to provide advice on choosing the most suitable wipers, car lamps and accessories, taking into account the make and model of your car.
values.delivery_description: We provide convenient delivery options throughout Kazakhstan and the CIS to make the purchasing process as convenient as possible for customers.
values.pricing_description: We always have current prices and special offers for our customers.

team.title: Our team
team.description: Our team of experts is always ready to provide professional advice on choosing the most suitable wipers, car lamps and accessories, taking into account the make and model of your car.
